editorialNotes.standard: This twist on the iconic board game lets you build landmarks, wreck rivals‚Äô property, and rake in profits.
This blockbuster runner¬†keeps charging ahead with loads of rewards to chase and special events set in cities across the world.

editorialNotes.tagline: Can you build the best base?
editorialNotes.standard: It‚Äôs hard to understate Clash of Clans‚Äô massive influence in establishing complex strategic multiplayer on mobile‚Äìwe still love logging on to find that our meticulously placed and upgraded fortifications survived another onslaught.

Colourful chaos awaits in our 2016 iPhone Game of the Year. Supercell‚Äôs awesome card battler delivers excellent deck-building mechanics and fast-paced fights in a package that‚Äôs easy to understand and undeniably fun. Upgrading, unlocking and experimenting with cards gives the game endless replayability, and deciding just where to drop your heroes makes each battle distinct. But no matter how good your deck is, there‚Äôs no substitute for skill and quick thinking.
editorialNotes.short: Collect powerful cards and crush your competition.

editorialNotes.standard: Miniclip‚Äôs 8 Ball Pool delivers a clean online billiards experience that awards players for speedy turns. We found ourselves collecting rare pool cues and training to clear tables faster, with higher scores and longer combos. An alluring level-up system and the ability to bet your in-game currency on the outcome of head-to-head matches makes jumping online for a quick game as rewarding as it is intense.¬†
editorialNotes.short: Finally, we can put that trigonometry to use!
